title: Senior Financial Analyst - Permanent Job at Yoh (Charlotte, NC)
text:
Source: Jobg8 
Sr. Financial Analyst needed for a direct hire opportunity with Yoh's client located in Charlotte, NC. 
The Big Picture - Top Skills You Should Possess: - Sr. Financial Analyst with experience developing financial modelling and reporting - Three to five (3-5) years of experience in related cost accounting position or equivalent combination of education and experience - Read, analyze and interpret general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, or governmental regulations - Sr. Financial Analyst will write reports, business correspondence, and procedure manuals - Effectively present information and respond to questions from groups of peers, managers, clients, customers, and the general public - Solve practical problems and deal with a variety of concrete variables in situations where only limited standardization exists. - Ability to interpret a variety of instructions furnished in written, oral, diagram, or schedule form 
What You'll Be Doing: - Sr. Financial Analyst will be responsible for managing cost accounting aspects of labor reporting system: - Set up and administer applicable EZ Labor functions and Concur - Develop and generate reports and analyze data - Record necessary entries into the G/L based on data collected - Determine cost of sales: - Monitor the cost projections on Margin Sheet to actual costs on Great Plains based inventory system, identify and assist in resolving discrepancies - Audit costs at time of order through time of shipment - Maintain Excel file of backorders and follow up with Operations group to insure backorders are fulfilled and billed properly - Sr. Financial Analyst will track percentage of completion and cost of sales for L&A and CFA Division: - Continually update project worksheets with Excel to determine percentage of completion - Constant communication with project managers to stay current on status of projects and insure all known costs are properly identified - Develop and generate reports and analyses data 
What You Need to Bring to the Table: - Bachelor's Degree in Accounting. - Three to five (3-5) years of experience in related cost accounting position or equivalent combination of education and experience. - Accounting experience. - Detail-oriented and ability to multi-task. - Ability to read and interpret data. - High level of personal initiative. - Dynamics Great Plains Software knowledge. - Proficient in Microsoft Office Word and Excel. 
Bonus Points! Otherwise Known As Preferred Qualifications: - Experience working with WennSoft project accounting. - Public accounting experience. 
What's In It For You? - Working for this client you'll have the opportunity to make a genuine impact on the organization as you expand your knowledge and skills. 
Get Hired, Apply Now! 
Yoh, a Day & Zimmermann company, is an Equal Opportunity Employer, M/F/D/V. Contact us if you are an individual with a disability and require accommodation in the application process. 
J2W: PROF
